item.title: Sources: Bucks not pressured to trade Giannis
item.description: The Bucks don't feel the pressure to move Giannis Antetokounmpo on Thursday, team sources told ESPN hours ahead of the NBA's trade deadline.

item.title: 'We're poor': Sampson bemoans UH's low budget
item.description: Houston coach Kelvin Sampson said his top-10 team can't sign more recruits because the school's athletic department is "very poor."

item.title: Sources: Dubs deal Kuminga, Hield for Porzingis
